itunes:title: Jason Cammisa
itunes:author: Matt Farah & Zack Klapman
itunes:summary:
Jason Cammisa is an automotive journalist with many strong-but-extremely-well-informed opinions. He has written for Automobile, Motor Trend, and Hagerty. His Instagram is hilarious and his video content is of the highest quality. If you don't follow him, you should. 
IG: @jasoncammisa
itunes:subtitle:
